channel.title: Corvallis-Newport Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Corvallis-Newport Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-20 West Approaching US-101
item.description: US-20 west approaching US-101, its western terminus. US-20 starts in Boston, Massachusetts, and at 3365 miles is the longest route in the United States.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching OR-229 North
item.description: US-20 west approaching OR-229 north to Siletz.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching Bus. US-20/Toledo
item.description: US-20 West approaching the eastern end of the Toldeo business loop.

item.title: US-20 West at OR-223 North
item.description: US-20 west at OR-223 north to Wren and Kings Valley. Continue on US-20 west for Blodgett and Newport.

item.title: US-20/OR-34 West at Turnaround To US-20/OR-34 East
item.description: US-20/OR-34 west at turnaround To US-20/OR-34 East in Philomath and western end of one-way couplet. Use US-20/OR-34 East to Corvallis. Notice the US-20 shield is incorrectly displayed using the Oregon state highway shield.

item.title: US-20/OR-34 West - Distance Marker
item.description: US-20/OR-34 West - distance marker to Philomath and Newport.

item.title: OR-34 East at Harrison Blvd.
item.description: OR-34 east at Harrison Blvd. Turn right to continue east on OR-34 towards I-5, Albany, and Lebanon. Turn left towards US-20/OR-99W, and Corvallis City Center.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching Harrison Blvd
item.description: OR-34 east approaching Harrison Blvd. Turn left on Harrison Blvd. for US-20/OR-99W.

item.title: US-20/OR-34 East at US-20/OR-99W
item.description: US-20/OR-34 east at US-20/OR-99W junction. Merge right to continue east on US-20. Use US-20 East/OR-99W for Downtown (Corvallis).

item.title: US-20/OR-34 East at 15th St.
item.description: US-20/OR-34 East at 15th St in Corvallis. Turn left for Oregon State University Main Campus; right for Avery Park. Continue ahead for OR-99W/Junction City/Eugene.

item.title: US-20/OR-34 East at Western Blvd.
item.description: US-20/OR-34 east at Western Blvd. Merge right to continue on OR-34 East/US-20 East towards Downtown (Corvallis).

item.title: US-101 North at Western End of US-20
item.description: Begin US-20 east to Toledo and Corvallis on US-101 north.
